# imageView

**Instance Property**

The image view that the scrubber item uses to display its image.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var imageView: NSImageView { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to access and configure the underlying image view used to display the image in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberImageItemView/image] property.

## Providing image content

- **image**: The image displayed by the scrubber item.
